paper_abstract: Herein, the cryptographic properties of some generalized cyclotomic sequences, with the period p(2), are investigated. Results show that these sequences always possess good balance and linear complexity (larger than half the period). Their autocorrelation functions are shown to be three-valued if p = 3 (mod 4), and five-valued otherwise. Moreover, the distribution of patterns of length 2 are discussed. (c) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Cryptographic properties of some binary generalized cyclotomic sequences with the length p(2)
